events.message: We have received the candidate’s application for the software engineering position and have added their resume to our system for review.
The application has been classified under the Engineering cluster after identifying keywords such as software engineer and developer in the resume.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate’s recruitment process and coordinate interviews.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call to assess the candidate’s technical skills and cultural fit for the software developer position.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about moving forward with the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate, including a coding challenge and system design discussion with the engineering team.
